text: Liam Dawson is a former Australian rules footballer who played for the Brisbane Lions in the Australian Football League (AFL). He made his AFL debut in round 8, 2015 against at Etihad Stadium. Dawson was delisted by the Lions at the end of the 2018 season, having played 18 games. ==References== ==External links == * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Brisbane Lions players Category:Aspley Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from Queensland
title: Liam Dawson (footballer)
